RelatedSentence: Deputy headteacher Gareth Williams , who pleaded guilty to charges of voyeurism and spying on children , will be sentenced today .

The deputy headteacher of a Cardiff school pleaded guilty to 31 charges relating to voyeurism and the making and possession of indecent images of children , including some that involve spying on children as they went to the toilet .

The deputy headteacher of a Cardiff school pleaded guilty to 31 charges relating to voyeurism and the making and possession of indecent images of children , including some that involve spying on children as they went to the toilet .
In February the city 's Magistrates Court heard Williams , 47 , of Rhiwbina in Cardiff , had admitted secretly filming children going to the toilet in a house for his own sexual gratification .
In February the city 's Magistrates Court heard Williams , 47 , of Rhiwbina in Cardiff , had admitted secretly filming children going to the toilet in a house for his own sexual gratification .
In February the city 's Magistrates Court heard Williams , 47 , of Rhiwbina in Cardiff , had admitted secretly filming children going to the toilet in a house for his own sexual gratification .

The 31 charges to which he has now pleaded guilty include nine of voyeurism , and a further 20 charges relate to the making of indecent images of children and two relate to the possession of 16,237 indecent photographs of children .
